sage.audio

Class AudioResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.resources.Resource
      • sage.audio.AudioResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JOALAudioResource

    public abstract class AudioResource
extends sage.resources.Resource
    This class represents an audio resource in memory. It encapsulates the data loaded from a sound file.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry
    See Also:
    Game Coding Complete

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AudioFormat getAudioFormat()
      Returns the AudioFormat of the sound file.
      AudioResourceType getAudioType()
      Returns the AudioResourceType of the sound file.
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns the name of the sound file.
      boolean getIsLoaded()
      Returns true if the sound file has successfully been loaded into memory; false otherwise.
